pages.title: Color Mixing
pages.text: By mixing [#](00ffff)Cyan[#](), [#](ff00ff)Magenta[#]() and [#](ffff00)Yellow[#] (almost) any colour can be created.

Your attempts to mix [Gemstone Powder](book://general/gemstone_powder) directly have not been very successful. But now you have another idea:\The closeness of your gemstones to nature suggests that _nature_ must be both the source and the answer!\\You quickly scribble some notes, result being [a recipe](book://general/colored_trees), which looks very promising.

pages.title: Brown Pigment?
pages.text: You have tried and tried, to no avail. You could not find a way to create [#](654321)brown[#]() by mixing your gem powder. The closest you came was a washed-out orange - ugh.\It can't be that hard. Like... [#](654321)Dirt is brown[#]() and it's the most common stuff around.\\There must be a way... \and you're pretty sure [#](000000)Black[#]() is the answer.
\\\\\\\_Seriously, look it up! The way we perceive brown is fascinating!_
